languages.text: {n}Джай отмахивается.{/n} "Шерин, между нами определенно проскочила искра, но она угасла. Я сейчас не пытаюсь считаться, но стали бы вы игнорировать мою просьбу помочь с обретением Меркатум Табула Официале, если бы испытывали ко мне жгучий интерес? Не забивайте голову мыслями о неслучившемся, шерин. Я видела от вас много добра, и этого достаточно для вечной благодарности. А большего нам Великий не послал".

{n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай отмахивается.{/n} "Шерин, между нами определенно проскочила искра, но она угасла. Я сейчас не пытаюсь считаться, но стали бы вы игнорировать мою просьбу помочь с обретением Меркатум Табула Официале, если бы испытывали ко мне жгучий интерес? Не забивайте голову мыслями о неслучившемся, шерин. Я видела от вас много добра, и этого достаточно для вечной благодарности. А большего нам Великий не послал".

languages.text: {n}Jae gesticula, desdeñosa.{/n} «Shereen, aunque definitivamente había una chispa entre l{mf|o|a}s dos, se ha difuminado. No quiero señalar a nadie, pero ¿de verdad habría ignorado mi petición de ayuda para obtener la Mercatum Tabula Officiale si ardiera de pasión por mí? No piense más en lo que podría haber sido, shereen. He visto mucho bueno por su parte, suficiente como para ganarse mi gratitud eterna. Pero eso es todo lo que el Exaltado nos ha enviado».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gesticula, desdeñosa.{/n} «Shereen, aunque definitivamente había una chispa entre l{mf|o|a}s dos, se ha difuminado. No quiero señalar a nadie, pero ¿de verdad habría ignorado mi petición de ayuda para obtener la Mercatum Tabula Officiale si ardiera de pasión por mí? No piense más en lo que podría haber sido, shereen. He visto mucho bueno por su parte, suficiente como para ganarse mi gratitud eterna. Pero eso es todo lo que el Exaltado nos ha enviado».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊挥挥手，让你离开。{/n}“亲爱的，我们之间肯定曾擦出过火花，但现在已经消散了。我不愿指责你，但如果你真对我充满了兴趣，你会忽视我想要得到帝国官方行商执照的请求吗？不要满脑子想着很多事情本可能会是什么样子，亲爱的。我从你身上得到了很多好处，这足以让我永远对你感激不尽。不过，至高无上的神皇为我们安排的，也就到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊挥挥手，让你离开。{/n}“亲爱的，我们之间肯定层擦出过火花，但现在已经消散了。我不愿指责你，但如果你真对我充满了兴趣，你会忽视我想要得到帝国官方行商执照的请求吗？不要满脑子想着很多事情本可能会是什么样子，亲爱的。我从你身上得到了很多好处，这足以让我永远对你感激不尽。不过，至高无上的神皇为我们安排的，也就到此为止了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは、あなたを払いのける。{/n}「シャリーン、あたしたちは確かにお互いに惹かれ合ったけど、その気持ちはもう消えてしまった。非難するつもりはないけど、もしあんたがあたしのことを本当に思っていたら、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れる手伝いをして欲しいっていうあたしの願いを無視したかな？起きたかもしれないことばかり考えるのはよして、シェリーン。あんたのいい所はたくさん見てきたし、そのことにあたしは永遠に感謝し続けると思う。だけど、エグザルテッド・ワンは、それ以上のものはあたしたちに与えなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは、あなたを払いのける。{/n}「シャリーン、あたしたちは確かにお互いに惹かれ合ったけど、その気持ちはもう消えてしまった。非難するつもりはないけど、もしあんたがあたしのことを本当に思っていたら、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れる手伝いをして欲しいっていうあたしの願いを無視したかな？起きたかもしれないことばかり考えるのはよして、シェリーン。あんたのいい所はたくさん見てきたし、そのことにあたしは永遠に感謝し続けると思う。だけど、エグザルテッド・ワンは、それ以上のものはあたしたちに与えなかった」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae balaie votre requête d'un revers de la main.{/n} « Shereen, s'il y a bel et bien eu une brève étincelle entre nous, elle s'est définitivement éteinte. Sans vouloir vous accuser de quoi que ce soit, auriez-vous refusé de m'aider à obtenir la Mercatum Tabula Officiale si vous vous consumiez d'amour pour moi ? Ne perdez pas votre temps à ressasser ce qui aurait pu se passer. Je vous serai éternellement reconnaissante de vos bontés, mais l'Exalté ne souhaite pas que les choses aillent plus loin entre nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae balaie votre requête d'un revers de la main.{/n} « Shereen, s'il y a bel et bien eu une brève étincelle entre nous, elle s'est définitivement éteinte. Sans vouloir vous accuser de quoi que ce soit, auriez-vous refusé de m'aider à obtenir la Mercatum Tabula Officiale si vous vous consumiez d'amour pour moi ? Ne perdez pas votre temps à ressasser ce qui aurait pu se passer. Je vous serai éternellement reconnaissante de vos bontés, mais l'Exalté ne souhaite pas que les choses aillent plus loin entre nous. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae winkt ab.{/n} "Shereen, es gab zweifellos einen Funken zwischen uns, doch der ist längst verglüht. Ich will keine Schuldzuweisungen machen, doch hättet Ihr meine Bitte um Hilfe bei der Beschaffung der Mercatum Tabula Officiale abgelehnt, wenn Ihr so brennendes Interesse an mir hättet? Füllt Euren Kopf nicht mit Gedanken daran, was hätte sein können, Shereen. Ich habe viel Gutes von Euch gesehen, und das reicht aus, um Euch meinen ewigen Dank zu verdienen. Doch mehr hat der Erhabene uns nicht geschickt."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

languages.text: {n}Jae, elini olumsuz anlamda sallıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, aramızda bir kıvılcım vardı. O kıvılcım artık söndü. Suçlar gibi konuşmak istemem ama bana ateşli hisler beslesen Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi almama yardım etmeni istediğimde beni göz ardı etmezdin, değil mi? Aklını boşuna geçmişte olabilecek şeylerle doldurma şirinim. Bana birçok iyiliğin dokundu, bu nedenle de sana sonsuza dek minnettarım. Görkemli aramızda daha fazlası olsun istememiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae waves you off.{/n} "Shereen, there was definitely a spark between us, but it has faded. I'm not trying to point the finger, but would you have ignored my request for help in acquiring the Mercatum Tabula Officiale if you had had a burning interest in me? Don't fill your head with thoughts of what might have been, shereen. I have seen much good from you, and that is enough to earn my eternal gratitude. But the Exalted One has sent us no more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae elini olumsuz anlamda sallıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, aramızda bir kıvılcım vardı, evet ama o kıvılcım artık söndü. Bir şeylere parmak basmak istemiyorum ama bana karşı ateşli hislerin olsaydı Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi almama yardım etmeni istediğimde beni göz ardı etmezdin, değil mi? Geçmişte olabilecek olanlarla zihnini boşuna doldurma şirinim. Bana birçok iyiliğin dokundu ve bu nedenle de sana sonsuza dek minnettarım. Görkemli aramızda daha fazlası olsun istemedi ama."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
